LanguageData.USAC_TempMechlinkTrigger.label: temporary mechlink
LanguageData.USAC_TempMechlinkTrigger.description: A temporary neural interface that grants mechanitor capabilities. The nanomachines forming this interface will degrade over time and be absorbed by the body.\n\nProvides 6 bandwidth for controlling mechanoids. Effect is lost upon death.
LanguageData.USAC_TempMechlinkKillSwitch.label: mechlink kill switch
LanguageData.USAC_TempMechlinkKillSwitch.description: This device will destroy the mechlink by overloading the neural interface after the user's death.
